description: This data collection is comprised of statistical summary as an average from LST scenes (processed in ArcGIS) that were captured at 11 AM EDT/12 PM EST by the Landsat 8 satellite (2013-2022). Scenes are Level 2-1, retrieved from the USGS Earth Explorer. Processed LST rasters in TIFF format are composed of 30x30m pixels that contain a LST value in Celsius (°C) for that area. Each raster image is clipped to Miami-Dade County boundaries (downloaded from the Miami-Dade County Open Data Hub).
name: Miami-Dade Average Land Surface Temperature 2013-2022

publisher.@value: University of Miami GDSC Public Domain
